sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
harmless
, tisto lahko varno uporabimo, se tistega dotaknemo ali tistemu pridemo v bližino.

seg.quote: The rocket thudded harmlessly to the ground.

sense.def:
Dejanje, ki je
harmless
, najverjetneje ne bo škodovalo drugim ali jim povzročalo skrbi.

seg.quote: Singing in the bath gives him a little harmless pleasure.
His column deals harmlessly with the antics of film stars.
